title: Former Speaker Lokubandara is new Governor of the Sabaragamuwa Province.
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Chandana Perera) Former Speaker of the parliament W.J.M.Lokubandara was sworn in as the new Governor of the Sabaragamuwa Province before President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees this afternoon on 21 April. Mr Lokubandara who was elected to the parliament in UNP ticket in the previous general election…
